value:
$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03_2,0|$WmMPID_水着ウルスラ,ch03_07_Ursula_F_Swim19,Face|Seems like everyone's here. Let's
get started, then, shall we?$k$p$WmMPID_水着リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_Swim19,Face|Wait, wait... Are we sure these outfits
are appropriate for what we're about
to do?$k$p$WmMPID_水着フィオーラ,ch03_24_Fiora_F_Swim19,Face|If it is what must be done, I will do it.
For my homeland...for Ilia!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ウォルト,ch02_19_Walt_M_Swim19,Face|I'll do whatever it takes too. Just you
wait and see!$k$p$WmMPID_水着リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Swim19,Face|All right, everyone... Let's go!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Another mission complete!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Yeah! We did it! But there's still one
thing I don't understand...$k$pWe worked hard getting these fancy
swimsuits ready, but then the others
already had their own!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You're right... And they looked eerily
similar to the ones Commander Anna
put together as well... How odd!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Grrrr... Curse you, other Anna! You
beat me to the punch—again!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Wait... An Anna from another world?
It can't be the same one as before,
can it?!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Hmm... Well, I do have quite a few
sisters. They make great allies—but
they're also my fiercest rivals.$k$pThis time, another Anna had the
same idea I did and managed to
cash in on it before I could...$k$p$EFace_Pain|Was it a merchant Anna from another
world? Or maybe a thief Anna? Argh!
It could be ANY kind of Anna!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|The world of business can be awfully
cutthroat, I guess, huh?$k$pI'm just glad you're back to your
usual energetic self, Commander!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|As am I. That, at the very least, is
something worth celebrating!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Just you wait, other Annas! Next year,
come summer...I'll show you what I'm
made of... You'll all see!$k$p$Sbs150|
